TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Records extends System.Object
public ref class Records abstract sealed

Docs.summary: The Records class defines utility functions associated with Record items.

remarks.para: Documents can be declared as records to prevent modification and/or deletion depending on the parent list's record declaration setting. Each list can also define its own permission level required to declare and undeclare records.

public: static void BulkDeclareItemsAsRecords(System::String ^ itemStr, Microsoft::SharePoint::SPList ^ parentList);

Docs.param: A comma delimited string of item IDs.
Docs.summary: Declares a collection of items as records.

remarks.para: This method must be used with elevated privileges.

Docs.param: List has been enabled for in-place records

remarks.para: The list is enabled for in-place records only if the the in-place records fields are provisioned on the list.

Docs.summary: Locks down an item.

remarks.para: Designates the object as read only, and checks out an associated object to the SHAREPOINT\SYSTEM account if such a file exists.

Docs.param: The strong name of the assembly containing the custom record handler class
The fully-qualified class name of the custom record handler
Docs.summary: Registers a custom record processing handler class to the specified site.

remarks.para: Custom record handler class should implement the IrecordDeclarationHandler interface and/or the IRecordUndeclarationHandler interface.
